tooltip.weight: Size does Matter! Studies show that the risk for type 2 diabetes and heart disease is increased for: women - waist size greater than 35 inches, men - waist size greater than 40 inches.
tooltip.water: Bottoms up! Every cell in your body needs water to function properly. It's estimated that 75% of Americans are chronically dehydrated.
tooltip.steps: One Step at a time!! Studies show that taking up to 7,500 steps per day can add years to your life.
tooltip.sleep: Get some ZZZZZ's!!!! Not getting enough quality sleep negatively affects the health of almost every organ system in your body including your brain, heart, and immune system.
tooltip.time_period: What time of day are you awake on a regular basis? This allows us to send you water reminders at the appropriate times. Ex. 8am to 8 pm
